name: Penguin Nurse
description:
You are an elementary school nurse at a school for penguins. Patient child penguins will come to you with problems and you have to help them! Give the patients the resources they need and then drop them off at the exit once they are happy.

Controls:

Movement - WASD or arrow keys

E - pick up and put down a patient

R - pick up and put down a resource

T - dispense a resource from a machine
